results.description: Combine actual EPS vs analyst estimate to capture earnings surprise momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (anl4_af_eps_value, eps_estimate_value). SUGGESTION2: no vector fields found so not applied. SUGGESTION3: both fields have high coverage so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4: both fields have moderate-to-high user/alpha counts (applied). Confidence = 0.75.

Signal = announced EBITDA minus mean analyst EBITDA to capture beat/miss dynamics. Used anl4_ebitda_value and anl4_ebitda_mean per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields. Coverage adequate so no ts_backfill. High user/alpha counts used per SUGGESTION4. Confidence = 0.7.

Use change in adjusted net income estimates to capture analyst revision momentum. Fields: anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft (forecast type flag) and est_netprofit_adj (mean). SUGGESTION1 applied with two fields; SUGGESTION3 not needed (high coverage). SUGGESTION4: est_netprofit_adj has good counts. Confidence = 0.68.

Momentum of EPS actual values via time-series returns. Single-field approach using anl4_af_eps_value per SUGGESTION1 (kept simple). No vector fields. Coverage high so no backfill. Used ts_returns to capture trend. Confidence = 0.65.

Use ratio of number of upper to lower estimations to detect improving analyst sentiment. Fields: anl4_ady_pu (upper counts) and anl4_ady_down (lower counts). SUGGESTION1 used. Both have good coverage; no backfill. Confidence = 0.6.

Stocks with high dispersion of sales estimates tend to mean-revert after volatility. Use sales_estimate_standard_deviation and sales_estimate_value per SUGGESTION1. Applied ts_backfill? coverage high so not needed. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share surprise
results.description: Actual FCF per share vs mean estimate to capture cash-flow surprises. Fields: free_cash_flow_per_share_actual_value and est_fcf_ps. Coverage of actual is lower (0.3514) so applied SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(actual,20). SUGGESTION4 used est_fcf_ps userCount moderate. Confidence = 0.6.

Rising net debt signals stress. Use net_debt_reported_value and est_netdebt. Coverage of net_debt_reported_value is 0.3883 so used ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Combined per SUGGESTION1. Confidence = 0.5.
Relative EBIT improvement scaled by total assets. Used anl4_ebit_value and total_assets_amount per SUGGESTION1. Both have good coverage; no backfill. Confidence = 0.66.

Captures persistent sales surprise by comparing actuals_value (quarterly) to sales_estimate_value. Both have high coverage; no backfill. SUGGESTION4: sales_estimate_value has high counts. Confidence = 0.72.
Trend in pretax income announced value (anl4_ptp_value) using ts_returns. Field has high coverage and user counts so SUGGESTION4 satisfied. No vector fields. Confidence = 0.62.
Use buy vs under counts (anl4_buy, anl4_under) to capture sentiment extremes. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage ~0.6243 so ok. Confidence = 0.58.
Operational profitability normalized by assets to find efficient earners. Used anl4_ebitda_value and total_assets_amount. Both have good coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Estimated vs actual cash flow from operations surprise
results.description: Compare announced CFO (anl4_cfo_value) to mean estimate anl4_cfo_median to detect surprises. Coverage moderate; no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4: cfo fields have good counts. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Rising SGA as negative growth signal
results.description: Increase in Selling, General & Admin expenses (selling_general_admin_expense) relative to sales indicates margin pressure — combine with gross_income_reported_value. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage adequate. Confidence = 0.52.

results.idea: High analyst std-dev of EPS -> idiosyncratic dispersion
results.description: Use earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to find stocks with high disagreement; often reverts. SUGGESTION1 single-field for simplicity. Coverage good. Confidence = 0.54.
Use max_reported_eps_guidance and min_reported_eps_guidance to detect guidance widening/narrowing. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Coverage 1.0 for guidance fields so reliable. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: Capex cut momentum (capex drop implies higher free cash flow)
results.description: Decrease in anl4_capex_value over quarter-to-quarter signals cash release. Used ts_delta on anl4_capex_value. Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Confidence = 0.56.
Increasing number of sales estimates (sales_estimate_count) indicates growing analyst coverage and attention; can precede moves. SUGGESTION4 used high counts. Confidence = 0.49.

results.idea: Book value momentum vs market (bvps vs price proxy omitted)
results.description: Use b vps (anl4_bvps_value) trending higher as value signal. No price field present so use relative zscore across universe. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4: bvps has decent counts. Confidence = 0.5.
ts_delta on est_grossincome to catch accelerating top-line estimates. est_grossincome has moderate coverage; applied ts_zscore for robustness. Confidence = 0.57.
Track change in anl4_ady_median (median of estimations) to detect shifting consensus. Coverage ~0.7196 decent; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence = 0.53.

results.idea: High free cash flow relative to capex
results.description: FCF / capex ratio to identify capital-efficient firms. Use anl4_fcf_value and anl4_capex_value per SUGGESTION1. Both have moderate coverage; no backfill. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: Tangible book value per share momentum
results.description: Track anl4_tbvps_mean trend via ts_returns for value trend. Coverage low (0.3321) so used ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 limited but applied. Confidence = 0.45.
Large number of 'buy' recommendations (anl4_buy) may mean crowded names that mean-revert — use reverse zscore. SUGGESTION1 single-field applied. Confidence = 0.48.
Compare ts_delta(est_ebit,4) to anl4_ebit_value to spot accelerating beats. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage adequate; no backfill. Confidence = 0.64.
Compare net_profit_adjusted_value (actual) to an analyst mean est_netprofit_adj. Actual has high coverage; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence = 0.67.

results.idea: High variance in sales estimates -> volatility premium
results.description: Use sales_estimate_standard_deviation to find stocks where dispersion may lead to outsized moves; apply ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence = 0.53.

results.idea: Adjusted EPS trend (GAAP vs non-GAAP divergence)
results.description: Compare est_eps (mean) vs est_epsr (GAAP mean) to find divergence between adjusted and reported earnings. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage decent. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: Cash flow growth vs EBITDA (quality of earnings)
results.description: Compare est_cashflow_op to anl4_ebitda_value; rising CFO relative to EBITDA indicates quality. Both fields have moderate coverage; applied SUGGESTION4 where possible. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: Rising analyst count as attention and positive info
results.description: Track anl4_ady_numest (number of forecasts) increases via ts_delta; using high userCount fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence = 0.47.
Use anl4_basicconafv110_pu (upper estimations) vs anl4_basicconafv110_down to detect one-sided broker moves. Both fields have good counts; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: High announced EBITDA vs historical mean (reversion)
results.description: Compare current anl4_ebitda_value to ts_mean(anl4_ebitda_value, 12) to capture reversion to trend. Coverage ok; no backfill. Confidence = 0.58.
Cross-sectional zscore of anl4_af_eps_value identifies relative EPS strength vs peers. SUGGESTION1 uses single high-quality field. Confidence = 0.65.
Use actuals_value_currency_code ? (not numeric) so instead compare sales_estimate_value to sales_estimate_median to capture skew in forecasts. SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence = 0.5.
ts_delta on est_fcf to capture accelerating cash flow expectations. est_fcf coverage moderate so SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence = 0.54.
Use basicdetailrec_ratingvalue (anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue) to find outlier consensus ratings (zscore). Coverage ~0.7104 with many users => SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.56.
Compare anl4_ptp_value to anl4_ptp_mean to identify persistent beats. Both fields present; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: High reported EPS volatility -> short-term reversals
results.description: Use anl4_dts_rspe (std of reported EPS) to find volatile EPS names; expect mean-reversion. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 shows many alphas. Confidence = 0.51.
ts_returns of operating_cashflow_reported_value to detect improvement. Coverage moderate; used ts_zscore for stability. Confidence = 0.53.

results.idea: High difference between max and min guidance (uncertainty)
results.description: Subtract min and max guidance for earnings or sales; wider gap indicates uncertainty. Use max_reported_eps_guidance and min_reported_eps_guidance. Coverage 1.0 so reliable. Confidence = 0.55.
ts_delta on anl4_total_rec to track shifts in analyst attention. SUGGESTION4 applied (high counts). Confidence = 0.46.

results.idea: Book value per share surprise vs estimate
results.description: Compare book_value_per_share_reported_value to est_bookvalue_ps (mean) to find valuation surprises. Both fields present; coverage moderate. Confidence = 0.5.
Track shareholders_equity_reported_value ts_returns to detect improving balance-sheet strength. Coverage ~0.6951; used ts_zscore. Confidence = 0.48.
anl4_ady_pu high relative to peers suggests positive revisions. Use zscore of anl4_ady_pu. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence = 0.57.

results.idea: Gross income actual vs estimate surprise
results.description: Compare gross_income_reported_value to est_gric_value (anl4_gric_value) to detect surprises. Both fields available; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: High analyst std in EBITDA -> contrarian
results.description: anl4_ebitda_std identifies disagreement in EBITDA forecasts – contrarian signal. Coverage lower (0.3585) but userCount moderate; applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3 to improve robustness. Confidence = 0.43.
Cross-sectional zscore of anl4_qf_az_eps to capture relative EPS forecast strength. Field coverage 0.7848 with many users => SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: High adjusted funds from operations guidance beat
results.description: Compare max_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance to min_adjusted... to capture guidance expansion, coverage 1.0 so reliable. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence = 0.52.
Compare est_ebitda (mean) trend to anl4_ebitda_value using ts_delta to detect accelerating beats. Both fields moderate coverage; SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: High cash flow to sales ratio
results.description: Use cash_flow_from_operations divided by actuals_value (sales) to find firms converting sales to cash. Both fields available; coverage moderate. Confidence = 0.58.
ts_delta on earnings_per_share_estimate_count to capture growing analyst focus. Field coverage 1.0 and high counts; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share trend vs mean
results.description: Compare free_cash_flow_per_share to ts_mean(free_cash_flow_per_share, 12) for momentum. Coverage moderate; ts_backfill not necessary. Confidence = 0.52.
Use anl4_tbvps_median and anl4_tbvps_mean divergence to identify mispricings. Coverage low so ts_backfill applied to stabilize medians. Confidence = 0.44.
Cross-sectional zscore of anl4_netprofita_mean to find relative adjusted net income strength. Good coverage and counts; SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Rising research & development spending slowing margins
results.description: Compare research_development_expense_reported_value to est_sga or sales to detect margin pressure. R&D fields low coverage; ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence = 0.42.
Increase in dividend_estimate_count may precede dividend surprises; use ts_delta. Coverage ~0.6151; applied as is. Confidence = 0.46.
Use anl4_fcf_flag or anl4_fcfps_number changes to capture intense forecast activity; fields have varied coverage; SUGGESTION4 used when counts high. Confidence = 0.48.

results.idea: High brokerage rating swings (detailed rec rating)
results.description: Track anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue ts_delta to identify sudden rating moves. Field has good counts so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: Cash flow per share surprise vs estimate
results.description: Compare anl4_af_cfps_value (actual) to anl4_qf_az_cfps_mean (mean of forecasts) to capture surprise. The median estimate field has lower coverage so used ts_backfill for robustness (SUGGESTION3). Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: High reported pretax income vs estimate
results.description: Compare pretax_income_reported_value to anl4_ptpr_mean to capture surprises; both exist and coverage varies; no backfill used. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: Sales estimate median vs mean divergence (skew)
results.description: Subtract median_sales_estimate from sales_estimate_value to detect skewed forecast distributions. Fields have high coverage. Confidence = 0.52.
ts_returns on anl4_netprofit_value to capture improving profitability momentum. High coverage (1.0) used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.66.

Compute gap between fsguidance max and min guidance fields (anl4_fsguidanceafv4_minguidance & anl4_fsguidanceafv4_maxguidance) to detect confidence (narrow = high). Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: High number of lower estimations -> contrarian long
results.description: anl4_basicconqfv110_down large relative to peers may indicate over-pessimism; used zscore. Coverage good; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.51.
Difference between anl4_qfd1_az_eps_number and anl4_qfd1_az_wol_spe (counts) to detect revision direction. Fields have strong user counts; used as is. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: High announced book value per share surprise
results.description: Compare anl4_bvps_value to anl4_bvps_median to detect book-value surprises. Coverage moderate; used zscore. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: Operating profit before depr & amort trend
results.description: Track operating_profit_before_depr_amort_min_guidance_qtr changes to detect management guidance shifts. Coverage 1.0 for guidance field; used ts_delta. Confidence = 0.48.

results.idea: High adjusted funds from operations per share
results.description: Compare max_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance_2 to min to detect guidance spread (coverage 1.0). Simple difference used. Confidence = 0.46.
Measure ts_product of recent EPS surprises (anl4_af_eps_value - eps_estimate_value) over 3 quarters to find persistent beaters. Both fields high coverage; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence = 0.62.
High sales_estimate_standard_deviation often mean-reverts; use reverse zscore. Coverage good. Confidence = 0.5.
Compare anl4_cfi_high (highest estimation) to anl4_cfi_mean to detect unexpected investing cash flow jumps. Coverage moderate; used as is. Confidence = 0.47.
Changes in shares_outstanding_max_guidance vs min guidance to detect dilution risk. Guidance fields coverage 1.0; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.45.
zscore of ts_returns(est_tot_assets,4) to find asset expansion trends. est_tot_assets has good coverage and counts, so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.52.

results.idea: Net profit announced vs median estimate
results.description: Compare anl4_netprofit_value to anl4_netprofit_median for beat/miss detection. Coverage 1.0 for announced net profit; used ts_zscore. Confidence = 0.63.
Use reverse zscore on anl4_netprofita_mean to expect reversion from extreme adjusted net income. Coverage ~0.7511 and decent counts. Confidence = 0.49.
Use anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (EPS std) undergoing ts_delta to find rising disagreement before moves. Coverage 0.571; used ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3 to reduce sparsity. Confidence = 0.44.

results.idea: Increasing stock option expense guidance risk
results.description: Track stock_option_expense_max_guidance_qtr vs min to spot rising expense guidance. Coverage 1.0; straightforward difference. Confidence = 0.4.
Divide anl4_fcf_value by total_assets_amount to assess FCF generation efficiency. Fields have moderate coverage. Confidence = 0.56.
ts_returns(pretax_income_total,4) compared to pretax_income_reported_min_guidance to capture guidance breakouts. Guidance coverage high (1.0); applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence = 0.5.
anl4_adxqfv110_pu (number of upper estimations) zscore to identify positive skew. Coverage ~0.6979 with high userCounts; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.55.
Subtract anl4_ebit_value from anl4_ebitda_value to measure depreciation/amortization impact and potential quality. Both fields high coverage and counts. Confidence = 0.58.
anl4_totgw_high minus anl4_totgw_mean to detect rising goodwill write-up risk. Coverage ~0.5374 low; applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence = 0.35.

results.idea: Forecast beats clustered by broker (broker counts)
results.description: Use anl4_eaz2lrec_person or broker-related count fields to detect broker-clustered positive revisions; these fields have lower coverage so used cautiously and ts_backfill applied. Confidence = 0.38.
Compare ts_delta(sales_estimate_value,4) to ts_delta(est_sga,4) to spot improving top-line while controlling costs. est_sga coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence = 0.48.

results.idea: Large revision in EPS number of estimates
results.description: Change in anl4_qfd1_az_eps_number indicates forecast activity; use ts_delta and zscore. High counts per SUGGESTION4. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: High announced FCF vs analyst FCF mean
results.description: Compare anl4_fcf_value to anl4_fcf_mean to detect surprises in FCF. Both fields have moderate coverage; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.57.
Difference between sales_max_guidance_quarterly and sales_min_guidance_quarterly; narrow band indicates management confidence. Coverage 1.0 for guidance -> reliable. Confidence = 0.47.

results.idea: High announced operating cashflow vs estimate
results.description: Compare operating_cashflow_reported_value to est_cashflow_op to detect quality beats. Both fields have moderate coverage; used zscore. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: Large upward shift in median EPS forecasts
results.description: ts_delta on anl4_ady_median to detect consensus upward revisions. Coverage 0.7196 good; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: High number of no-recommendation brokers as uncertainty
results.description: anl4_norec elevated suggests uncertainty; use zscore(reverse) as contrarian. Coverage ~0.6243 moderate. Confidence = 0.4.

results.idea: Rising market attention via estimate counts for sales
results.description: Increase in sales_estimate_count_quarterly signals attention; use ts_delta. Coverage 1.0 and many users -> SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.49.
Subtract earnings_per_share_average from earnings_per_share_median_value to detect skewed forecasts. Fields coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.51.

results.idea: Rapid increase in analyst lower estimations -> sell signal
results.description: ts_delta on anl4_basicconqfv110_down to detect growing downside revisions. Coverage 0.7262 good with many users. Confidence = 0.54.
Estimate margin proxy using anl4_ebit_value divided by sales_estimate_value to spot margin improvement. Both fields present; coverage adequate. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: High forecast standard deviation in total assets -> noisy balance sheets
results.description: Use anl4_totassets_std to detect noisy asset estimates; apply reverse zscore for mean-reversion. Coverage low (0.3233) so ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence = 0.36.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share announced vs mean
results.description: Compare free_cash_flow_per_share_actual_value to anl4_fcfps_mean to detect beats; actual low coverage -> ts_backfill used. Confidence = 0.45.

results.idea: Rising operating profit before depreciation guidance
results.description: Compare operating_profit_max_guidance_qtr with operating_profit_min_guidance_qtr to detect tightening (confidence). Guidance fields coverage 1.0; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: High analyst median capex decline -> free cash flow boost
results.description: ts_delta on anl4_median_capexp to detect capex cuts leading to better cash flow. Median capex coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not applied. Confidence = 0.46.

results.idea: Adjusted net income mean vs median divergence
results.description: Subtract anl4_netprofita_mean from anl4_netprofita_median to detect skew and potential surprises. Coverage ~0.7511; applied SUGGESTION4 for counts. Confidence = 0.53.
Use ts_zscore of anl4_mark to capture improving consensus score. Coverage ~0.6243 with many users; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.52.

results.idea: Earnings per share announced vs guidance extremes
results.description: Compare actual EPS (anl4_af_eps_value) with guidance extremes (earnings_per_share_maximum/minimum) to find surprising guidance. Guidance fields coverage 1.0 -> reliable. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: High number of upper estimations in basiccon -> momentum
results.description: zscore(anl4_basicconafv110_pu) to find strong upward revision momentum. Coverage ~0.7343 and good counts -> SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.56.

results.idea: Free cash flow announced volatility -> contrarian
results.description: Use anl4_fcfps_number or anl4_fcf_ps std to identify volatile FCF per share; prize mean-reversion. Fields low-moderate coverage; ts_backfill applied if sparse. Confidence = 0.42.

results.idea: High reported EBITDA vs analyst low estimate (tail risk)
results.description: Subtract anl4_ebitda_low from anl4_ebitda_value to detect large upside surprise vs pessimistic estimates. Coverage moderate; used zscore. Confidence = 0.54.
Compare pretax_income_total ts_returns to max_pretax_profit_guidance to capture upside vs guidance. Guidance coverage 1.0; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence = 0.49.

results.idea: Analyst estimate coherence (num estimates vs stddev)
results.description: Divide anl4_qf_az_eps_number by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation to detect coherent consensus (high number low stddev = reliable). Both fields have reasonable counts; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.6.
ts_delta(median_sales_estimate,4) to find improving sales outlook; coverage high and reliable. Confidence = 0.53.
ts_delta(bvps_value,4) to catch improving fundamentals in book value per share. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings estimate momentum from analyst revisions (number delta)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_epsr_number, 12) to capture rising number of GAAP EPS estimations as momentum. Field coverage decent; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.48.
Subtract sharehoders_equity_max_guidance minus sharehoders_equity_min_guidance to spot management confidence; guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence = 0.45.
Operating cashflow / capital_expenditure_amount to find firms converting capex into cash flow. Both fields available; coverage moderate. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum in announced pretax income vs peer universe
results.description: Cross-sectional zscore of anl4_ptp_value to capture relative strength. Coverage moderate; SUGGESTION4 used high alpha counts where present. Confidence = 0.6.

results.idea: High number of upper estimations in basicconltv (long-term)
results.description: anl4_basicconltv110_pu zscore to detect long-term upward estimate pressure. Coverage ~0.7004; SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence = 0.5.

results.idea: Large change in announced capex vs estimates
results.description: Subtract anl4_capex_value from anl4_capex_high to detect upside capex surprises; used zscore. Coverage moderate. Confidence = 0.47.

results.idea: High announced net profit vs mean estimates
results.description: zscore(subtract(net_income_total_2, est_netprofit)) to find profit surprises. net_income_total_2 coverage high; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.62.
ts_delta(anl4_afv4_eps_mean,4) to capture increasing EPS estimates for annual frequency. Coverage 1.0 for that field; used ts_zscore. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: High announced EBITDA vs analyst low (tail)
results.description: anl4_ebitda_value minus anl4_ebitda_low zscore to find strong upside surprises. Coverage moderate and many alphaCounts used. Confidence = 0.56.

results.idea: Large change in net debt guidance to detect risk
results.description: Subtract max_net_debt_guidance - min_net_debt_guidance to find volatility in net debt expectations; guidance coverage 1.0 so reliable. Confidence = 0.44.

results.idea: High reported operating profit vs estimate mean
results.description: anl4_ptp_value vs anl4_ptp_mean zscore to detect positive surprises. Fields moderate coverage; used as is. Confidence = 0.61.

Product of recent sales surprise deltas (ts_product) to capture persistent beaters. Uses sales_estimate_value and actuals where available; if actual missing ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. Confidence = 0.57.

results.idea: High number of basiccon estimates indicates consensus strength
results.description: Use anl4_basicconafv110_numest zscore to find strong-consensus names (stability). Coverage ~0.7343; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence = 0.5.
